value:
Let's get this out of the way now:
don't expect me to play nice. That's
just not my style.

Stealth, huh? An arrow is perfect for
that—catch someone unaware and
you can end them in an instant.

This outfit fits a little TOO well...
You didn't have a ninja investigate
me, did you?

Heading out to patrol the castle, huh?
In that case, I'm coming with. Just
think of me as your shadow.

You leave yourself wide open. If I was
an enemy, you'd have been riddled
with arrows ages ago.

I have a message for you from
$Nf.$k$p...Got it? Good. And not one word
about this outfit.

Bah! It's just one thing after another
with you people... Don't even bother
trying to run—you're mine now.

Maybe being a ninja ain't so bad
after all. Huh? Oh, I was just...talking
to myself. You heard nothing, got it?

Damn it... Did I draw too
much attention?

You sure my skills aren't too flashy?
Well, if you're fine with this, I'm
certainly not gonna complain about it.

I'm Shinon. Hm? This outfit? Uh...
Listen, I'm on a covert mission. This
ain't how I usually dress, I swear!

This is a Hoshidan festival... So
why the heck did you rope me of
all people into it?$k$pRidiculous as it is, guess I can't deny
that it's been a learning experience.
...Not like I wanted it, though. Haha!$k$pBut y'know, even if I still can't say I
totally get what makes ninja tick,
I do feel a bit closer to them now.$k$pRanged mercs need to stay quiet
and inconspicuous if we want to
survive out there, after all.$k$pBah! You're one of only two people
whose requests I'd be willing to
hear out. So...what's next?
てやっ
そらよっ
うっ…
のやろっ!
It's over for you.
Hope you're ready.
Let's try to enjoy this.
Too slow.
Damn... That was careless...
ふん
Why are you forcing me to join this stupid festival, anyway?
You're so clingy. How'd you like it if I kept tapping you all day?
You don't have to be quiet to take out enemies quietly. You just have to make sure no one lives to rat you out.
Gatrie seems to think this outfit would help him get a date. Can he wear it instead?
Wait, you think my long hair gets in the way of combat? Get lost.
Festivals are supposed to be fun. So why am I stuck here working?
I don't work for scraps. If you want my help, you better make it worth my time.
Fine.
Make up your mind.
Take your time.
